Client results

We work with smart clients who understand that a great customer experience is the key to excellent business

A lot of our work we’re unable to talk about publicly, but get in touch to find out about clients we’ve helped in your industry.

Kmart

User research, A/B testing, UX Design

We've worked with Kmart for the years to run an end-to-end managed service A/B testing program.

  • Double digit conversion increase by better explaining shipping policies
  • 2800% increase in sign-ups to the Kmail email marketing program
  • Measured ROI of on-site merchandising activity to allow for the efficient allocation of resources

Large car manufacturer

User research, A/B testing, UX Design

We worked with the Australian arm of a large Japanese car manufacturer to help optimise their Test Drive Request lead generation forms.

  • Significantly reduced cost of customer acquisition by identifying leaky funnel steps
  • 200% increase in Test Drive Request submissions through form optimisation

Telegraph Media Group

User research, A/B testing, UX Design

The Telegraph is a daily broadsheet newspaper published in London. Founded 160 years ago, the newspaper maintains a hugely dedicated following of readers and receives 100m visitors to their website every month.

We were engaged to support a newly established Product and UX function by developing an in-house optimisation program.

This work involved:

  • Defining roles, processes and governance for test development, QA, release and results distribution
  • Working with stakeholders across the business to design experiments to give useful data quickly
  • Set-up a framework for test planning and reporting documentation and distribution.

We also achieved some pretty great test results:

  • 8% increase in subscription sales
  • 22% increase in user engagement
  • 14% lift in video plays

NSW Mutual Bank

User research, A/B testing, UX Design

We were engaged by one of Australia's largest mutual banks to help increase online mortgage applications.

In an iterative cycle of research and testing, we achieved a 23% increase in applications.

  • Double digit conversion increase by better explaining shipping policies
  • 2800% increase in sign-ups to the Kmail email marketing program
  • Measured ROI of on-site merchandising activity to allow for the efficient allocation of resources

EE

User research, A/B testing, UX Design

Formed as a joint venture between Orange and T-Mobile, EE is the largest mobile telco in the UK.

We were engaged soon after a site re-launch to undertake usability research with a view to increasing checkout conversion by simplifying and streamlining product discovery and purchase.

  • 800% increase in insurance sales
  • De-risked the merger of two of the UK's most iconic brands by using A/B testing to trial phased brand deprecation
  • Helped transition A/B testing from a fringe activity to a core business function at the centre of strategic decision making
